sentence.Network_en: The slightest little bit of inattention can let something slip through.
sentence.Network_cn: 稍不留神就会让某些东西蒙混过关。

sentence.Network_en: The accident was the result of a moment's inattention.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次事故是一时不小心造成的。

sentence.Network_en: One moment of inattention when driving could be fatal.
sentence.Network_cn: 开车时稍一疏忽就可能出人命.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... horrific a. 令人恐惧的， 可怕的 inattention n. 不注意， 疏忽 induce v. 产生， 造成.
21世纪大学英语读写教程单词表(一) - 豆丁网 ... sloppy a. 粗心的，草率的 inattention n. 不注意；漫不经心 avail n. 效果；作用.
(1)注意力不集中(Inattention)：无法专心完成一件工作或游戏，写字时常会漏字、加字或跳行无法专心听人说话，经常逃避排斥需全神 …
注意力不良 ( Inattention )：做事较难专心，一件事不容易从头做到尾，容易分心，念书时常会有漏字、加字或跳行，无法定下来专心 …

list.abs: tactile corpuscles of Meissner 触觉小体tactile inattention 触觉忽视tactile sense 触觉
...这方面的规矩在两种其他类型的管理技巧中尤其明显，即礼貌性疏忽（civil inattention）和角色距离（role distance）首先，礼貌性 …
1．选择性忽视（selective inattention）,即有意不去注意自己的挫折和精神痛苦，对伤心事不去感知，不去接触，不去回忆，不去思索，包括下列一些方.
作者将这种现像称之为不注意视盲(inattentional blindness)--我们不会注意到原本不预期会出现的事物认真追捕犯人的警察很可能会对.
这个录像源自于经典的“非注意盲视（inattentional blindness）”实验。在原版的录像中，当人们被要求数出两个球队互相传球的次数时…

entry.def: A person's inattention is their lack of attention.

example.ex: Vital evidence had been lost through a moment's inattention.
example.tran: 关键证据由于一时的疏忽而丢失了。

auth_sentence.content: A silent, almost morose, inattention to each other.
auth_sentence.res_content: A silent, almost morose, inattention to each other.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A silent, almost morose, inattention to each other.

auth_sentence.content: Encephalitis causes inattention and impulsivity. Encephalitis causes aggression.
auth_sentence.res_content: Encephalitis causes inattention and impulsivity. Encephalitis causes aggression.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Encephalitis causes inattention and impulsivity. Encephalitis causes aggression.

auth_sentence.content: For instance, it could detect inattention.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For instance, it could detect inattention.

means.word_mean: 不注意;漫不经心；心不在焉

sentences.en: He preceded his speech with a warning against inattention.
sentences.cn: 他在开始讲演前告诫大家不得心不在焉。

sentences.en: One moment of inattention when driving could be fatal.
sentences.cn: 开车时稍一疏忽就可能出人命。

sentences.en: He was dismissed for inattention to his duty.
sentences.cn: 他由于玩忽职守而被解职。
